snippet: With government workers facing furloughs and pay cuts, President Obama is sure to face criticism about activities like golf outings.
abstract: Pres Obama, with government workers facing furloughs and pay cuts, is sure to face criticism about activities like golf outings; months ahead will be tricky for him on whether or not to adjust his family's activities.
lead_paragraph: With government workers facing furloughs and pay cuts, President Obama is sure to face criticism about activities like golf outings.

headline.seo: Spending Cuts Complicate Obama’s Free Time
headline.main: Amid Cuts, Does a President Dare Tee Off?
headline.print_headline: Amid Cuts, Does a President Dare Tee Off?
